info.name: Speed Dial-Transparent
info.description:
Makes the background transparent for the logos and takes away the frame for them
o.b.s you must have transparent logos. If you don't, here you can find one for almost any website:  http://userlogos.org/logos
info.additionalInfo: When taking logos from userlogos.org simply copy the logos url or save the image and the put i the individuel cells options
